articles.title: Tesla Opens India’s First All-in-One Experience Centre in Gurugram
articles.description:
Tesla has taken another major step in its long-anticipated India expansion with the opening of the country’s first fully integrated “all-in-one” Tesla Centre in Gurugram, Haryana. Located at Orchid Business Park in Sector 48, the […]

articles.description:

articles.title: Tesla Begins FSD Demo Drives in Europe – With a Catch
articles.description:
Tesla has begun offering its first Full Self-Driving demo drives in Europe. However, there’s an important catch, as the company works to officially bring FSD to the region. The pilot program is currently available in […]

articles.title: International Tesla Cybertruck deliveries begin in South Korea
articles.description:
Tesla has officially delivered its first Cybertruck vehicles outside of North America. On November 27, 2025, Tesla Korea confirmed that the first customer Cybertrucks were handed over in South Korea, putting the stainless-steel electric truck […]

articles.title: Tesla’s Two-Seat Cybercab Design Justified by New Waymo Data
articles.description:
Newly published robotaxi occupancy data from Waymo is sparking fresh discussion about what future autonomous fleets should actually look like — and it’s giving Tesla’s upcoming two-seat Cybercab some notable validation. The data, highlighted this month by Toyota Europe product designer Karim Dia Toubajie in a detailed LinkedIn post, comes from Waymo’s Q3 2025 filings […]

The post Tesla’s Two-Seat Cybercab Design Justified by New Waymo Data appeared first on TeslaNorth.com.
articles.author: Nehal Malik

articles.title: Starlink Steps In With Free Internet After Indonesia Floods
articles.description:
Starlink is stepping in to support communities across Indonesia following severe flooding that has devastated regions of Sumatra this week. “For those affected by the severe flooding in Indonesia, Starlink is providing free service to new and existing customers through the end of December,” Starlink says on its official Support website and in a post […]

The post Starlink Steps In With Free Internet After Indonesia Floods appeared first on TeslaNorth.com.
articles.author: Nehal Malik

articles.title: Tesla Model 3 Wins Best Passenger Car in New Zealand
articles.description:
Tesla’s refreshed Model 3 continues its winning streak in Oceania, picking up a major honor in New Zealand this week. DRIVEN Car Guide officially named the Model 3 the country’s Best Passenger Car of 2025, praising the sedan for its value, technology, and driving experience. Tesla’s local X account celebrated the achievement on the platform, […]

The post Tesla Model 3 Wins Best Passenger Car in New Zealand appeared first on TeslaNorth.com.
articles.author: Nehal Malik

articles.title: Tesla Lets Europe Test FSD From the Passenger Seat
articles.description:
Tesla is giving European drivers their first hands-on look at Full Self-Driving (Supervised), with the company launching FSD ride-alongs across Italy, France, and Germany. As announced by Tesla Europe on X, the new program lets anyone sign up to experience FSD (Supervised) from the passenger seat as a Tesla employee handles the driving. “Come experience […]

The post Tesla Lets Europe Test FSD From the Passenger Seat appeared first on TeslaNorth.com.
articles.author: Nehal Malik
